title: Dead Air: The Dead Series: Vol 2
description:
Dead Air is more than just silence...
 Four chilling journeys into the silence.Dead Air Book 2 in The Dead Series.
Ghost Gun
On his eighteenth birthday, Pete Devereaux visits his ailing war-hero grandfather—only to face a harrowing choice that will forever change the course of his life.
Bleeding Heart
A week after their final, fateful supper, grieving widow Laura hears the whispers—then the gentle knocking—and finally, a second heartbeat that isn’t her own.
Mr. Burns
Before he was the infamous fire-wielding artist Mr. Burns, Blake Pierce was just a boy—until a fateful visit to a mysterious junk shop in Old Castle set his world ablaze.Mr Burns originally appeared as a secondary character in Jonathan's latest 2024 novel Fireman.
The Wardrobe
Don and Tracy Montague stumble upon a stunning wardrobe at a yard sale for their twin daughters' bedroom. But some doors should never be opened.
author: Jonathan  Dunne
